translations: v.传真（文档、信件等）；用传真与（某人）联系（fax 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Many libraries will help you with locally supplied information about business management shared through chambers of commerce and government agencies, and they will offer printing, faxing and database services you need.
sentences.translation: 许多图书馆会为你提供由本地商会及政府机构共享的商业管理信息，同时提供你所需要的打印、传真及数据库服务。

sentences.sentence: With a scanner, you can email documents as PDFs instead of faxing.
sentences.translation: 而有扫描仪的话，你又可以不用发传真，而是将文件扫描成PD F档电邮给客户。

sentences.sentence: Why electronic fax instead of faxing using a good old 'All-in-one' fax/printer/scanner machine?
sentences.translation: 为什么不使用全功能的传真/打印/扫描一体机呢？
